trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 在視覺化設計工具提供設計階段支援<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control is used as a container for other controls, especially when controls are generated programmatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控制會當做容器使用其他控制項，尤其是當控制項透過程式設計方式產生。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The PanelDesigner class provides design-time support for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controls in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: PanelDesigner 類別提供設計階段支援<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>視覺化設計工具中的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: However, for all new implementations of the Panel control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> instead of the PanelDesigner.
trans-unit.target: 不過，針對所有新面板控制項的實作，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>而不是 PanelDesigner。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換到設計檢視中，標記來源描述相關聯的程式碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控制會剖析並在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 當您切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項就會保存標記原始程式碼，並編輯成 Web 網頁的標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> method maps a specified property and value to a specified markup style.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A>方法會將指定的屬性和值對應至指定的標記樣式。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A> method provides notification when a behavior is attached to the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A>方法行為已附加至設計工具時，提供通知。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner>類別時，它會建立相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控制項或該控制項的設計介面上的複本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Maps a specified property and value to a specified markup style.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的屬性和值對應至指定的標記樣式。

trans-unit.source: The MapPropertyToStyle method provides special handling for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A> properties, but calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> base method for all other values of the `propName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: MapPropertyToStyle 方法提供一項特殊處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A>屬性，但呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A>基底方法的所有其他值`propName`參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the property name.
An object that is the property value.
Provides notification when a behavior is attached to the designer.
trans-unit.target: 行為已附加至設計工具時提供通知。

trans-unit.source: The OnBehaviorAttached method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A> base method.

Then the OnBehaviorAttached maps the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A> properties to the appropriate style by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> method, if these properties are defined.
trans-unit.target: 則 OnBehaviorAttached 對應<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A>屬性，以使用適當的樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A>方法，如果這些屬性定義。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A>
